#Text=Jacqulyn Buglisi
#Text=Jacqulyn
#Text=Buglisi
#Text=is an American choreographer , artistic director , dancer , educator , and founder or co-founder of multiple dance institutions .
#Text=Buglisi , with Terese Capucilli , Christine Dakin and Donlin Foreman , founded Buglisi Dance Theatre in 1993/94 ( formerly BuglisiForeman Dance ) .
#Text=Choreography
#Text=Buglisi 's ballets are highly visual and imagistic dances that draw from literature , history and heroic archetypes as primary sources .
#Text=Buglisi 's ballets are rooted in strong physical technique .
#Text=Her repertoire of more than eighty works has been seen by audiences at venues across the United States including :
#Text=John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts
#Text=Joyce Theater
#Text=Jacob 's Pillow Dance Festival
#Text=Society of the Performing Arts Wortham Theater Center – Cullen Theater , Houston
#Text=Kravis Center for the Performing Arts
#Text=Spring to Dance Festival , St. Louis
#Text=SUNY Purchase Performing Arts Center – Concert Hall
#Text=Richard B. Fisher Center for the Performing Arts
#Text=– Sosnoff Theater
#Text=University of Arizona
#Text=– Centennial Hall

#Text=Internationally , her works have appeared at the Melbourne International Festival- State Theater ; during International Dance Week in Prague ; the Czech Republic , Japan , Italy , France and Israel .
#Text=Lynn Garafola of Dance Magazine wrote , " Buglisi is a rarity in today 's world , a woman who delights in the many splendid forms of female being .

#Text=Probably no woman , other than Graham , has plumbed such emotional depths choreographically  [ 1 ] and for Buglisi 's www.UndertheButtonwoodTree.com commissioned by LMCC , Alastair Macaulay of The New York Times wrote , " Cecil B. DeMille would have been proud " . [ 2 ]

#Text=Her commissions include The Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater , Ailey 2 , The LMCC River to River Festival , New York Flamenco Festival in Madrid ; Sadler 's Wells Theater London and New York City Center ; The Richmond Ballet ; pieces for Ananda Shankar Performing Arts Company of India ; the Shanghai Song and Dance Ensemble of China ; The Juilliard School , The Martha Graham Dance Company ; North Carolina Dance Theater ; Joyce Trisler Danscompany ( charter member/choreographer ) and the Teatro Danza Contemporanea di Roma ( co-founder/choreographer ) .

#Text=Buglisi Dance Theatre presented 150+ dancers at Lincoln Center in The Table of Silence Project 9/11 , a public tribute and ritual honoring peace and tolerance ,  a magnificent expression of peace " .

column1: #Text=Live streaming around the globe reaching 102 countries and across all 50 states , www.tableofsilence.org . [ 5 ]

#Text=Other Table of Silence Site-specific commemorations were presented at the Pan Am 103 Remembrance Wall during the company 's NYSCA residency at Syracuse University ; in Perugia and Assisi , Italy ; and UC Santa Barbara on May 23 , 2016 , to mark the anniversary of a mass-shooting near the campus .
#Text=Her company 's repertoire is archived for public viewing at the Jerome Robbins Dance Division of the New York Public Library .
#Text=In recognition of her excellence as a choreographer , dancer , and educator in 2016
#Text=Buglisi was awarded a lifetime achievement award from Italian International Dance Award .
#Text=Dancer
#Text=Photo credit by Jack Mitchell

#Text=During her 30-year association with the Martha Graham Dance Company , Buglisi danced as a principal artist for 12 years , performing the classic roles such as the Three Mary 's ( El Penitente ) , Andromache ( Cortege of Eagles ) , the Warrior ( Seraphic Dialogue ) , the Lament ( Acts of Light ) , the Girl in Yellow ( Diversion of Angels ) , Leader of the Night Journey Chorus and Jocasta ( Night Journey ) , Creusa ( Cave of the Heart ) , The Spectator ( Every Soul is a Circus ) and in Tangled Night created for her by Martha Graham .

#Text=She danced in Graham 's honor on the nationally televised CBS Presentation of the Kennedy Center Honors and is featured in the PBS film , An Evening of Dance and Conversation with Martha Graham .

#Text=Coached by Jane Sherman , Buglisi performed the solos of Ruth St. Denis at Jacob 's Pillow and internationally , including Lyon Biennale De La Dancse , on film in Trailblazers of American Modern Dance , and also in the film , The Spirit of Denishawn . [ 6 ]
#Text=Educator

#Text=Buglisi has been commissioned by The Juilliard School 's Emerging Modern Masters Series , Ailey/Fordham University B.F.A. Program , the University of Richmond , California State University/Long Beach , George Mason University , Purchase Conservatory of Dance , Interlochen Center for the Arts , the State Ballet College of Oslo , Oklahoma Arts Institute , Jacob 's Pillow Dance Festival , Boston Conservatory of Music , Randolph-Macon College and National Dance Institute , among others . [ 7 ]
#Text=In 1970 , Buglisi founded the first school of contemporary dance for the community of Spoleto , Italy , and was the Master Artist-in-Residence at the Atlantic Center for the Arts . [ 8 ]

#Text=She has taught for the Dance Aspen Festival from 1990 to 1995 , the Julio Bocca Center in Argentina , the Victoria College in Melbourne in 1999 , and the Chautauqua Institution and Festival from 1995 to 2005 .

#Text=As a resident teacher in New York City , she has been chairperson of the Modern Department at The Ailey School , has served on the faculty of The Juilliard School from 1991 to 2005 , The Martha Graham School of Contemporary Dance since 1977 , and Ballet Hispanico School of Dance .
#Text=Buglisi guest teaches at the LaGuardia High School of the Performing Arts ( alumna ) and instructs workshops at Steps on Broadway and Peridance Capezio Center .
#Text=She was named honorary chair for the Marymount Manhattan College 2005 Gala and served as a panelist for both the Heinz Family Foundation and the New Jersey State Council for the Arts .

#Text=Buglisi holds creative and educational residencies at Kaatsbaan International Dance Center , Munson-Williams-Proctor Arts-Institute , SUNY Purchase , California State University , Long Beach , George Mason University , University of Richmond , The Mahayfee Theater Class Act in FSU at Tallahassee , Petersburg Florida , and Syracuse University . [ 9 ]

#Text=Buglisi 's awards and honors include the American Dance Guild Award for Artistic Excellence , Italian International Lifetime Achievement Award 2016 , Fiorello LaGuardia Award for Excellence in the field of Dance , The 2014

#Text=Kaatsbaan International Playing Field Award , The Gertrude Shurr Award for Dance , Altria Group 's 2007 Women Choreographer Initiative Award , as well as grants for new work from the National Endowment for the Arts , New York State Council on the Arts , NYC Department of Cultural Affairs , Harkness Foundation for Dance , Howard Gilman Foundation , and The O'Donnell-Green Music & Dance Foundation . [ 10 ]
#Text=Buglisi served on the Dance/USA 's Board of Trustees as Chair of Artistic Director 's Council from 2010 to 2013 . [ 11 ]
